wikipedia_page.main:
Joseph Netherclift (8 September 1792 - 8 April 1863) was an English composer and lithographer. He was awarded a medal in 1829 for his method of lithography. He was making lithographic facsimiles of historical documents in 1833.Perhaps his most famous work is "We Happy Shepherd Swains".
Netherclift died 8 April 1863 and is buried in Brompton Cemetery, London.
